title: Interview Preparation
description: Master technical interview skills and strategies
introduction: Ace your technical interviews with comprehensive preparation covering coding, system design, behavioral questions, and best practices.

concepts.name: STAR Method
concepts.example:
Situation: Set the context
Task: Describe your responsibility
Action: Explain what you did
Result: Share the outcome

Example:
'Tell me about a challenging project'
S: Working on e-commerce checkout
T: Reduce cart abandonment by 20%
A: Implemented one-click checkout
R: Achieved 25% reduction in 3 months

concepts.name: Problem-Solving Framework
concepts.example:
1. Understand & Clarify
   - Ask questions
   - Identify constraints
   - Examples and edge cases

2. Plan
   - Brute force approach
   - Optimize
   - Choose data structures

3. Implement
   - Write clean code
   - Test as you go

4. Test & Debug
   - Run test cases
   - Handle edge cases

examples.title: Common Behavioral Questions
examples.code:
1. Tell me about yourself
2. Why do you want to work here?
3. Describe a challenging project
4. How do you handle conflicts?
5. Tell me about a failure
6. Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
7. Why are you leaving your current job?
8. Describe your ideal work environment
9. How do you prioritize tasks?
10. Tell me about a time you showed leadership

examples.title: Coding Interview Tips
examples.code:
✓ Think aloud - explain your approach
✓ Ask clarifying questions
✓ Start with brute force, then optimize
✓ Use meaningful variable names
✓ Test with examples
✓ Consider edge cases
✓ Analyze time/space complexity
✓ Stay calm and organized
✓ Practice on LeetCode/HackerRank
✓ Review data structures daily
